title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration: use any Ollama model as an LLM, chat, or embeddings provider in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user); drop-in replacement for ChatGPT UI.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers synchronous, asynchronous, and reactive APIs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for chatting and generating with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform TUI (Rust) for interactive chat, model pull/delete, and logs in your terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style code-completion service for VS Code.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration: use Ollama models as generators or chatters in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda 8 connector that invokes Ollama models inside BPMN processes for human-like tasks.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & autoscaling support.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Declarative Ollama package and NixOS module; pin models and configs in your system flake.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain in a single Docker Compose.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that brings any Ollama model to your server with slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Lightweight Slack bot (Go) that answers questions using a local Ollama model via Socket-Mode.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI pipelines: pre-pull models, run evaluations, or serve Ollama inside Dagger engines.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir wrapper with GenServer behaviour for streaming chats and GenStage producers.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate providing strongly-typed APIs for chat, generate, embeddings, and model ops.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package to run and chat with Ollama models from mobile or desktop apps.
